advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
NOTHING ON TV?

Project movies, music videos & more onto a TV using only your iPhone or iPad.  

Discover over 100 channels of great entertainment beyond the standard TV guide right on your phone's touchscreen interface. Choose from hit movies, music videos, comedy, news and sports. Then tap your phone to instantly zap a show to your connected TV and enjoy.

You can even adjust TV volume and playback straight from your mobile device. Plus, switch from watching on a TV to a mobile device without interrupting playback. Best of all, you don't need a dongle, cable or set-top box.

Turn your phone into a magic wand of entertainment.

Make TV Magical.

Supported players:
- Internet-connected TVs by Samsung, Sony, Panasonic, LG & Philips
- XBox 360, Xbox One, DISH Hopper, Apple TV, Chromecast

**Upgrade to Flipps HD**
- Stream unlimited videos in epic HD quality.
- No in-app ads.
trackCensoredName: Flipps – Watch Movies, Music Videos, Clips and Stream Sports, Kids and News TV Channels for Free
trackName: Flipps – Watch Movies, Music Videos, Clips and Stream Sports, Kids and News TV Channels for Free
releaseNotes:
- New, more intuitive user interface for movies and TV series that includes the full movie title with each movie poster
- Refined video list screen
- Reworked text type and size for better readability and a more seamless experience
- New channel category - "All" - which allows you to access all of the videos in a channel for quicker browsing (note: enabled for some of the channels)
- Stability and performance improvements to make Flipps run more smoothly and efficiently

** Don’t miss nine free movies from the Wibi channel this month including Rain Man, Transformers, Grown Ups, I Am Legend and more. Grab the popcorn and enjoy them all on the big-screen TV, instantly. **
